rule.name: valid
rule.title: packages.xml is valid
rule.msg: The file packages.xml is valid against repo.xsd.

rule.name: version-pkg
rule.title: One package per version
rule.msg: The file packages.xml contains one package file per package version.

rule.name: author
rule.title: Authors must exist
rule.msg: The file packages.xml contains only existing authors.

rule.name: categories
rule.title: Categories must exist
rule.msg: The file packages.xml contains only existing categories.

rule.name: files
rule.title: Directories and files must exist
rule.msg: All directories (corresponding to pkg/@id and version/@num) and files referenced from packages.xml exist.

rule.name: badges
rule.title: Badges must exist
rule.msg: There is a badge for the repository and every package.
